data.body:
if you filter the foolery beats by "in action" you'll see a lot of beats in actions state blocked by "humean next" despite the label correctly saying "Agent:next"

these are all in an invalid state.

- the "ownership" column should have the title "owner typet"
- it should just say human or agent (not next)
- it should hav ethe correct owner type (they are all agent owned)
- they should all be rolled back to the Ready (queued) state so that they can be folded into the proper workflow.
data.title: beats view: in action filter shows mismatched ownership
